import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import ContainerDefault from "~/components/layouts/ContainerDefault"; import HeaderDashboard from "~/components/shared/headers/HeaderDashboard"; import { connect, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { toggleDrawerMenu } from "~/store/app/action"; import { addProduct } from "~/store/product/action"; const CreateProductPage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(toggleDrawerMenu(false)); }, []); const submitProduct = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() console.log('product submitted') dispatch(addProduct()) } return (
{/* PRODUCT IMAGE */}
{/* PRODUCT FEATURES */} {/* */}
Back {/* */}
); }; export default connect((state) => state.app)(CreateProductPage);
